problem_text_cn: 如图,有一长、宽、高分别为12cm,4cm,3cm的木箱,在它里面放一根细木条(木条的粗细忽略不计)要求木条不能露出木箱,请你算一算,能放入的细木条的最大长度是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, there is a wooden box with length, width, and height respectively N_0, N_1, and N_2. Put a thin wooden strip in it (the thickness of the wooden strip is ignored). The wooden strip must not be exposed to the wooden box. Please calculate , The maximum length of the thin wooden strips that can be put in is ()
raw_answer: 试题分析::如图,连接AC、AD,可知木箱中的最长的线段为AD,在Rt△ABC中,根据勾股定理可得AC²=AB²+BC²=160,在Rt△ACD中,由勾股定理可得AD²=AC²+CD²=169,即可求得AD=√{169}=13,故答案选A.
